dsOverview.title: South African Area 1-Minute Elevation Data

summary.p: This dataset contains gridded 1-minute resolution terrain elevation data for the area around South Africa.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: ZA/WRC > South African Water Research Commission, South Africa

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Land Surface > Topography > Terrain Elevation
